snippet: The choir and the period band Concert Royal gave a rousing performance of the oratorio “Israel in Egypt” at St. Thomas Church in Manhattan.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance by St Thomas Choir of Men and Boys and period band Concert Royal at St Thomas Church.
lead_paragraph: The choir and the period band Concert Royal gave a rousing performance of the oratorio “Israel in Egypt” at St. Thomas Church in Manhattan.

headline.main: Review: St. Thomas Choir and Concert Royal Perform Handel
